綫字的基本解释

綫
xiàn
见“线”。

綫字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiàn］
［《廣韻》私箭切，去線，心。］
亦作“綖2”。亦作“線1”。“线1”的繁体字。
(1)用棉、毛、丝、麻、金属等材料制成的细缕。
(2)细长如线的东西。
(3)交通路线。
(4)指思想政治上的路线。
(5)所接近的某种边际；边缘交界处。
(6)眼线；线索。
(7)纺线。
(8)量词。数词限用“一”，表示细微。
(9)几何学名词。指一个点任意移动所构成的图形。有直线和曲线两种。
(10)通“騸”。阉割。

綫字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　綫； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页927第10
〔古文〕線【廣韻】【集韻】?私箭切，音線。【說文】縷也。【玉篇】可以縫衣也。【廣韻】細絲。【前漢·高惠高后文功臣表】不絕如綫。【註】晉灼曰：今線縷字。　又【集韻】相然切，音僊。義同。亦作絤?。

line
Basic explanation of words
line
xiàn
See "line".
line
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiàn］
["Guangyun" private arrow cut, go to the line, heart. ]
Also known as "綖2". Also referred to as "Line 1". Traditional characters for "线1".
(1) Thin strands made of cotton, wool, silk, linen, metal and other materials.
(2) Something slender like a thread.
(3) Traffic route.
(4) Refers to the ideological and political line.
(5) Some kind of margin approaching; marginal junction.
(6) Eyeliner; clue.
(7) Spinning thread.
(8) Quantifiers. Numerals are limited to "one", which means subtle.
(9) Geometric terms. Refers to a figure formed by arbitrary movement of a point. There are two types: straight line and curved line.
(10) Through "骟". Castration.
line
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not concentrated] [Shizi Department] 　 Line; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 927 No. 10
[Ancient text] line [Guangyun] [Jiyun]? Private arrow cut, sound line. [Said the text] also. [Jade articles] You can also sew clothes. [Guangyun] Thin wire. 【Former Han·Gao Hui Gao Houwen Meritorious Form】It's endless as a line. [Note] Jin Zhuo said: Today's line of characters.　[Jiyun] It’s the same, the sound is immortal. The same meaning. Also used as 絤?.
